x_snc_hack4good_0_hack4good_proposal.problem_statement:
Every monsoon, regions along the rivers flood-prone areas in India face devastating floods that displace thousands of families. As someone living near River Godavari, I faced this firsthand. There are many rivers in India and people living by these rivers are impacted badly. Despite repeated incidents, real-time and coordinated disaster information always lacking.
No single, reliable platform exists to display live flood levels, safe shelters, or available relief resources.
